channel.title: Competition on HKU ArmStrong
channel.description: Recent content in Competition on HKU ArmStrong

item.title: Upcoming Student Competition: Random Bin Picking Task
item.description:
We are excited to announce that we will be launching a student competition focused on a random bin picking task using the Dobot Magician robotic arm. This competition aims to challenge students to develop innovative solutions for robotic manipulation and automation.

Stay tuned for more information on the competition details, rules, and how to participate. We look forward to seeing the creative and effective solutions that students will bring to this challenge!
